Privacy Policy
Effective Date: 28/03/2025
Welcome to Ripple Notes! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our app.
1. Information We Collect
1.1 Personal Data
We do not collect any personal information like name, email, or phone number.
1.2 Notes and User Content
All notes you create in Ripple Notes are stored locally on your device.
We do not upload, store, or share your notes on any server.
1.3 Analytics and Permissions
We may use third-party analytics tools to improve the app experience, but we do not track any personally identifiable data.
The app may request permissions (e.g., storage access) to save and manage your notes effectively.
2. How We Use Your Data
We use your data only to provide the core functionality of the app, such as:
Saving and managing notes
Enhancing app performance
We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
3. Security
We prioritize the security of your notes. Since all data is stored locally on your device, it is your responsibility to protect your phone from unauthorized access.
4. Third-Party Services
If our app links to external websites (e.g., for backups or resources), we are not responsible for their privacy policies.
